channel.title: CVE Feed for archesproject -- arches
channel.description: The latest CVEs for archesproject -- arches

item.title: CVE-2022-41892|2024-08-03T12:56:38.199Z -- archesproject -- arches
item.description: Arches is a web platform for creating, managing, & visualizing geospatial data. Versions prior to 6.1.2, 6.2.1, and 7.1.2 are vulnerable to SQL Injection. With a carefully crafted web request, it's possible to execute certain unwanted sql statements against the database. This issue is fixed in version 7.12, 6.2.1, and 6.1.2. Users are recommended to upgrade as soon as possible. There are no workarounds.
